Params: {1: 'Consumed by Darkness', 2: 'Chapter 8', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{3: 'Connection Request—E-02 Babylonia Private Channel'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Command here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Gray Raven Commandant! Are you aware of the risks of your actions?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "In the name of the Babylonia Council, I'm ordering you to retreat, Gray Raven!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Sir, we're still in the middle of our mission...", 3: '9'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'This is insubordination.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Your actions have severely compromised the strategic safety of Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Your commanding authority will be suspended temporarily. I repeat. Withdraw immediately.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Warning! An unauthorized third party has entered the channel!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What is this madness?! This is a private channel!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Oh, sorry folks. Late for the video conference.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'President Hassen?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'If the Gray Ravens retreat, what are we going to do about Kamui?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Just a defective Construct. It's not worth an entire elite squad for him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But he did display a possibility to fight against the Punishing Virus.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'That is only what his leader is saying. Even the Purifying Force has not given a concrete answer. This is too much to risk an elite squad for an uncertain return of this degree.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You know, that sounds just like what an elite squad is for.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'President!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Can't babysit them all your life, mom.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Ah, just a joke, chill.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Alright, loosen up a little. Trust them more, for they know what they're doing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "We'll need to assess Chrome's report as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'No time to chitchat around here now.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Gray Raven squad, HQ will be airdropping you some supplies. The drop location will be sent to Liv through Celica. Retrieve them, then finish the mission quickly and return safely.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Wait, I'm not done yet—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Disconnected.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Ah, got it! I have the coordinates for the supplies. It's near us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The airdrop will likely cause commotion and attract some Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No time to lose.', 3: '45'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Karen and Watanabe will be protected by the Forsaken and be repaired at their campsite. As for Karen's situation, she should be stable in the meantime with the sleep command.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We can wait until after the mission to bring Karen back to Babylonia for a full checkup.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's go. With the Ascendants involved, the situation is urgent.", 4: '2'}
